long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Solar Savings Calculator extension helps you calculate how much money you can save by switching to solar power. With energy costs on the rise, many homeowners and businesses are turning to solar energy for a more sustainable and cost-effective future. This tool makes it easy to assess potential savings and see if solar is the right choice for you.

Key Features:
Simple calculation based on your location and energy usage.
Adjustable for different rates, incentives, and financing options.
Visual savings projections over the next 20 years.
Compare solar savings to your current energy bill.
Environmentally friendly â€“ see the carbon footprint reduction.
Why Use This Extension?

Get accurate, personalized savings estimates in seconds.
Make an informed decision on switching to solar energy.
Track long-term savings and environmental impact.
Whether you're just curious or ready to take the leap into solar energy, this extension is an invaluable tool for any homeowner or business interested in reducing energy costs and going green.
